scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:cliCore" "npm run dev:cliCoreExec" "npm run dev:cliModelsPackage" "npm run dev:cliModelsCommand" "npm run dev:cliCommandsInit" "npm run dev:cliUtilsCommon" "npm run dev:cliUtilsGetNpmInfo" "npm run dev:cliUtilsLog"
scripts.relink: npm run relink:cliModelsCommand && npm run relink:cliModelsPackage && npm run relink:cliExec && npm run relink:cliCore && npm run relink:cliCommandInit
scripts.relink:cliCommandInit: lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-command-init npm unlink && lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-command-init npm link
scripts.relink:cliCore: lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-core npm unlink && lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-core npm link
scripts.relink:cliExec: lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-core-exec npm unlink && lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-core-exec npm link
scripts.relink:cliModelsPackage: lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-models-package npm unlink && lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-models-package npm link
scripts.relink:cliModelsCommand: lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-models-command npm unlink && lerna exec --scope @caee/cli-models-command npm link
scripts.clean: lerna exec -- shx rm -rf lib && shx echo =====clear-end=====
scripts.build: npm run clean && lerna exec -- tsc && shx echo =====build-end=====
